345 /*LVDS feature is unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
346 int32_t MmwDemo_setHsiClk(void)
347 {
348  rlDevHsiClk_t hsiClkgs;
349  int32_t retVal;
350 
351  /*************************************************************************************
352  * Setup the HSI Clock through the mmWave Link:
353  *************************************************************************************/
354  memset ((void*)&hsiClkgs, 0, sizeof(rlDevHsiClk_t));
355 
356  /* Setup the HSI Clock as per the Radar Interface Document:
357  * - This is set to 600Mhz DDR Mode */
358  hsiClkgs.hsiClk = 0x9;
359 
360  /* Setup the HSI in the radar link: */
361  retVal = rlDeviceSetHsiClk(RL_DEVICE_MAP_CASCADED_1, &hsiClkgs);
362  if (retVal != RL_RET_CODE_OK)
363  {
364  /* Error: Unable to set the HSI clock */
365  //System_printf ("Error: Setting up the HSI Clock Failed [Error %d]\n", retVal);
366  return -1;
367  }
368 
369  /* The delay below is needed only if the DCA1000EVM is being used to capture the data traces.
370  This is needed because the DCA1000EVM FPGA needs the delay to lock to the
371  bit clock before they can start capturing the data correctly. */
372  Task_sleep(HSI_DCA_MIN_DELAY_MSEC);
373 
374  return 0;
375 }
376 
385 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorOpen(void)
386 {
387  bool startStatus = true;
388  int32_t errCode;
389 
390  /* Open mmWave module, this is only done once */
391  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorOpened == false)
392  {
393  /* Get the open configuration: */
394  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig (&gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg);
395 
396  /* Setup the calibration frequency: */
397  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.freqLimitLow = 760U;
398  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.freqLimitHigh = 810U;
399 
400  /* start/stop async events */
401  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.disableFrameStartAsyncEvent = false;
402  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.disableFrameStopAsyncEvent = false;
403 
404  /* Open the mmWave module: */
405  if (MMWave_open (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg, &errCode) < 0)
406  {
407  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Open failed %d\n", errCode);
408  /* Post event that start failed */
409  startStatus = false;
410  }
411  else
412  {
413  startStatus = true;
414 
415  /*Set up HSI clock*/
416  if(MmwDemo_setHsiClk() < 0)
417  {
418  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
419  }
420 
421  /* mmWave module has been opened. */
422  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorOpened = true;
423  }
424  }
425  else
426  {
427  /* openCfg related configurations like chCfg, lowPowerMode, adcCfg
428  * are only used on the first sensor start. If they are different
429  * on a subsequent sensor start, then generate a fatal error
430  * so the user does not think that the new (changed) configuration
431  * takes effect, the board needs to be reboot for the new
432  * configuration to be applied.
433  */
434  MMWave_OpenCfg openCfg;
435 
436  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig (&openCfg);
437 
438  /* initialize to same as in "if" part where open is done
439  * to allow memory compare of structures to be used.
440  * Note that even if structures may have holes, the memory
441  * compare is o.k because CLI always stores the configurations
442  * in the same global CLI structure which is copied over to the
443  * one supplied by the application through the
444  * CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig API. Not using memcmp will
445  * require individual field comparisons which is probably
446  * more code size and cumbersome.
447  */
448  openCfg.freqLimitLow = 760U;
449  openCfg.freqLimitHigh = 810U;
450 
451  /* start/stop async events */
452  openCfg.disableFrameStartAsyncEvent = false;
453  openCfg.disableFrameStopAsyncEvent = false;
454 
455  /* Compare openCfg */
456  if(memcmp((void *)&gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg, (void *)&openCfg,
457  sizeof(MMWave_OpenCfg)) != 0)
458  {
459  startStatus = false;
460  /* Post event that start failed */
461  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
462 
463  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
464  }
465  else
466  {
467  startStatus = true;
468  }
469  }
470 
471  return startStatus;
472 }
473 
484 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorStart(void)
485 {
486  bool startStatus = true;
487  int32_t errCode;
488 
489  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == false)
490  {
491  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount++;
492 
493  /* Get the configuration from the CLI mmWave Extension */
494  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionConfig (&gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg);
495 
496  /* Configure the mmWave module: */
497  if (MMWave_config (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg, &errCode) < 0)
498  {
499  MMWave_ErrorLevel errorLevel;
500  int16_t mmWaveErrorCode;
501  int16_t subsysErrorCode;
502 
503  /* Error: Report the error */
504  MMWave_decodeError (errCode, &errorLevel, &mmWaveErrorCode, &subsysErrorCode);
505 
506  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Config failed [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
507  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
508 
509  /* Post event that start failed */
510  startStatus = false;
511  }
512  else
513  {
514  /* Setup the data path: */
515  MmwDemo_dataPathConfig ();
516  if (MmwDemo_dataPathStart()==0)
517  {
518  /* The sensor has been started successfully. Switch on the LED */
519  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 1U);
520 
521  /* Sensor has been started successfully: */
522  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = true;
523  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus = 0U;
524 
525  /* Post event that start is done */
526  startStatus = true;
527  }
528  else
529  {
530  /* Post event that start failed */
531  startStatus = false;
532  }
533  }
534  }
535  else
536  {
537  /* Not expected */
538  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
539  }
540 
541  return startStatus;
542 }
543 
554 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart(void)
555 {
556  bool startStatus = true;
557 
558  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
559  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == false)
560  {
561  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount++;
562  if (MmwDemo_dataPathStart()==0)
563  {
564  /* The sensor has been started successfully. Switch on the LED */
565  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 1U);
566 
567  /* Sensor has been started successfully: */
568  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = true;
569  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus = 0U;
570 
571  /* Post event that start is done */
572  startStatus = true;
573  }
574  else
575  {
576  /* Post event that start failed */
577  startStatus = false;
578  }
579  }
580  else
581  {
582  /* Not expected */
583  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
584  }
585  return startStatus;
586 }
587 
597 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorStop(void)
598 {
599  bool stopStatus = true;
600  int32_t errCode;
601 
602  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == true)
603  {
604  /* Stop the mmWave module: */
605  if (MMWave_stop (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &errCode) < 0)
606  {
607  MMWave_ErrorLevel errorLevel;
608  int16_t mmWaveErrorCode;
609  int16_t subsysErrorCode;
610 
611  /* Error/Warning: Unable to stop the mmWave module */
612  MMWave_decodeError (errCode, &errorLevel, &mmWaveErrorCode, &subsysErrorCode);
613  if (errorLevel == MMWave_ErrorLevel_ERROR)
614  {
615  /* Error: Display the error message: */
616  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Stop failed [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
617  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
618 
619  /* Set the status of the stop. */
620  stopStatus = false;
621 
622  /* Not expected */
623  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
624  }
625  else
626  {
627  /* Warning: This is treated as a successful stop. */
628  System_printf ("mmWave Stop error ignored [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
629  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
630  stopStatus = true;
631  }
632  }
633  else
634  {
635  stopStatus = true;
636  }
637  }
638  else
639  {
640  /* Not expected */
641  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
642  }
643 
644  if(stopStatus == true)
645  {
646  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_CTRLPATH_STOP_STATUS;
647 
648  /* Sensor stopped, Notify data path to handle sensor stop */
649  MmwDemo_dataPathStop(&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj);
650  }
651 
652  return stopStatus;
653 }
654 
664 static void MmwDemo_finishSensorStop(void)
665 {
666  /* The sensor has been stopped successfully. Switch off the LED */
667  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 0U);
668 
669  /* Sensor has been stopped successfully: */
670  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = false;
671 
672  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopCount++;
673 
674  /* print for user */
675  System_printf("Sensor has been stopped: start:%d stop%d\n",
676  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount,gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopCount);
677 }
688 void MmwDemo_sensorStateInit(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
689 {
690  bool startStatus = true;
691 
692  switch(event)
693  {
694  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
695 
696 
697  /* Sensor Open */
698  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorOpen();
699 
700  /* Sensor Start */
701  if (startStatus == true)
702  {
703  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStart();
704  }
705 
706  /* Post events to CLI/key switch task with start results */
707  if(startStatus == true)
708  {
709  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
710  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
711  }
712  else
713  {
714  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
715  /* mmwave open or start failed, remain in the INIT state */
716  }
717 
718  break;
719 
720  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
721  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
722  break;
723  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
724  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
725  break;
726  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
727  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
728  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
729  /* These events will be ignored in INIT state */
730  break;
731 
732  default:
733  /* Not expected */
734  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
735  break;
736  }
737 }
738 
749 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStart(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
750 {
751  bool stopStatus = true;
752 
753  switch(event)
754  {
755  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
756  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
757 
758  /* These events trigger the stop process */
759  stopStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStop();
760  if (stopStatus == true)
761  {
762  /* Change sensor state to wait for ALL Components stop done */
763  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP_PENDING;
764  }
765  else
766  {
767  /* Sensor Stop error, do assertion */
768  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
769  }
770  break;
771 
772  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
773  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
774  /* Ignore duplicate command */
775  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
776  break;
777 
778  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
779  /* Finite frame loop configuration, BSS stop comes first */
780  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_STATUS;
781  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
782  {
783  /* Not expected events */
784  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
785  }
786  else
787  {
788  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP_PENDING;
789  }
790 
791  break;
792 
793  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
794  /* Not expected events */
795  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
796  break;
797 
798  default:
799  /* Not expected events */
800  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
801  break;
802  }
803 }
804 
815 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStopPending(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
816 {
817  bool stopStatus = true;
818  bool postEvent = false;
819 
820  switch(event)
821  {
822  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
823  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
824  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == 0)
825  {
826  /* Ignore duplicated events from CLI/key press */
827  }
828  else
829  {
830  /* For finite loop frame configuration, BSS done comes first, always waiting for sensor stop from CLI */
831 
832  /* Start sensor stop on control path */
833  stopStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStop();
834  if (stopStatus == true)
835  {
836  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_CTRLPATH_STOP_STATUS;
837  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
838  {
839  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
840  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
841  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
842  postEvent = true;
843  }
844  else
845  {
846  /* Stay in the same stae, waiting for data path event */
847  }
848  }
849  else
850  {
851  /* Not expected */
852  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
853  }
854  }
855  break;
856 
857  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
858  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
859  /* This events can come for finite frame loop configuration, unblock CLI */
860  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
861  break;
862 
863  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
864  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_STATUS;
865  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
866  {
867  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
868  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
869  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
870  postEvent = true;
871  }
872  else
873  {
874  /* Stay in the same state, waiting for all componets stopped */
875  }
876  break;
877 
878  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
879  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_STATUS;
880  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
881  {
882  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
883  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
884  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
885  postEvent = true;
886  }
887  else
888  {
889  /* Stay in the same state, waiting for all componets stopped */
890  }
891  break;
892 
893  default:
894  /* Not expected events */
895  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
896  break;
897  }
898 
899  /* Post CLI event if the request comes from CLI */
900  if ((postEvent == true) & (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent == 0))
901  {
902  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
903  }
904 }
905 
916 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStop(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
917 {
918  bool startStatus = true;
919  bool postEvent = false;
920 
921  switch(event)
922  {
923  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
924  /* These events trigger sensor start process */
925 
926  /* Sensor Open */
927  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorOpen();
928 
929  if(startStatus == true)
930  {
931  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStart();
932  }
933  postEvent = true;
934 
935  if(startStatus == true)
936  {
937  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
938  }
939  else
940  {
941  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
942  }
943  break;
944 
945  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
946  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
947  postEvent = false;
948 
949  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart();
950  if(startStatus == true)
951  {
952  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
953  }
954  else
955  {
956  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
957  }
958 
959  break;
960  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
961  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
962  postEvent = true;
963 
964  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart();
965  if(startStatus == true)
966  {
967  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
968  }
969  else
970  {
971  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
972  }
973  break;
974 
975  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
976  /* Event should be ignored, post event to unblock CLI*/
977  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
978  break;
979 
980  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
981  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
982  /* Ignore these events in STOP state */
983  break;
984 
985  default:
986  /* Not expected events */
987  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
988  break;
989  }
990 
991  /* Post complete/fail event to CLI */
992  if ((postEvent == true) & (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent == 0))
993  {
994  if(startStatus == true)
995  {
996  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
997  }
998  else
999  {
1000  /* Start failed, post fail event */
1001  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
1002  }
1003  }
1004 }
1005 
1009 MmwDemo_sensorSMFunc MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[MmwDemo_SensorState_MAX]=
1010 {
1011  MmwDemo_sensorStateInit,
1012  MmwDemo_sensorStateStart,
1013  MmwDemo_sensorStateStopPending,
1014  MmwDemo_sensorStateStop
1015 };
1016 
1029 static void MmwDemo_switchPressFxn(unsigned int index)
1030 {
1031  /* Post Key Press event to sensor management task */
1032  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT);
1033 }
1043 static void MmwDemo_sensorMgmtTask (UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
1044 {
1045  UInt event;
1046 
1047  /* GPIO Input: Configure pin N7 as GPIO_1 input */
1048  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
1049  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC_GPIO_1);
1050 
1051  /* GPIO Output: Configure pin N13 as GPIO_2 output */
1052  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
1053  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ_GPIO_2);
1054 
1055  /**********************************************************************
1056  * Setup the SW1 switch on the EVM connected to GPIO_1
1057  * - This is used as an input
1058  * - Enable interrupt to be notified on a switch press
1059  **********************************************************************/
1060  GPIO_setConfig (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1, GPIO_CFG_INPUT | GPIO_CFG_IN_INT_RISING | GPIO_CFG_IN_INT_LOW);
1061  GPIO_setCallback (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1, MmwDemo_switchPressFxn);
1062  GPIO_enableInt (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1);
1063 
1064  /**********************************************************************
1065  * Setup the DS3 LED on the EVM connected to GPIO_2
1066  **********************************************************************/
1067  GPIO_setConfig (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, GPIO_CFG_OUTPUT);
1068 
1069  /* Start the Task: */
1070  while (1)
1071  {
1072  /* Wait for a sensor event */
1073  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, Event_Id_NONE,
1074  MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT | MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT |
1075  MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT | MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT |
1076  MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT | MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT,
1077  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1078 
1079  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state >= MmwDemo_SensorState_MAX)
1080  {
1081  /* Not expected state */
1082  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1083  }
1084 
1085  /************************************************************************
1086  * Sensor Start Event:
1087  ************************************************************************/
1088  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT)
1089  {
1090  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1091  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START);
1092  }
1093 
1094  /************************************************************************
1095  * Sensor Start Event:
1096  ************************************************************************/
1097  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT)
1098  {
1099  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1100  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START);
1101  }
1102 
1103  /************************************************************************
1104  * Sensor Stop Event:
1105  ************************************************************************/
1106  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT)
1107  {
1108  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1109  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP);
1110  }
1111 
1112  /************************************************************************
1113  * Sensor bss Stop Event:
1114  ************************************************************************/
1115  if (event & MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT)
1116  {
1117  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP);
1118  }
1119 
1120  /************************************************************************
1121  * Sensor datapath Stop Event:
1122  ************************************************************************/
1123  if (event & MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT)
1124  {
1125  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP);
1126  }
1127 
1128  /************************************************************************
1129  * Sensor key press Event:
1130  ************************************************************************/
1131  if (event & MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT)
1132  {
1133  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 1;
1134  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS);
1135  }
1136  }
1137 }
1138 
1150 void MmwDemo_notifySensorStart(bool doReconfig)
1151 {
1152  if (doReconfig) {
1153  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT);
1154  }
1155  else {
1156  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT);
1157  }
1158 }
1159 
1171 void MmwDemo_notifySensorStop(void)
1172 {
1173  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT);
1174 }
1175 
1176 
1186 int32_t MmwDemo_waitSensorStartComplete(void)
1187 {
1188  UInt event;
1189  int32_t retVal;
1190  /* Pend on the START NOTIFY event */
1191  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify,
1192  Event_Id_NONE,
1193  MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT|MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT,
1194  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1195 
1196  /************************************************************************
1197  * DSS event:: START notification
1198  ************************************************************************/
1199  if(event & MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT)
1200  {
1201  /* nothing much to do here */
1202  retVal=0;
1203  }
1204  else if(event & MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT)
1205  {
1206  /* nothing much to do here */
1207  retVal = -1;
1208  }
1209  else
1210  {
1211  /* we should block forever till we get the event. If the desired event
1212  didnt happen, then throw an assert */
1213  retVal = -1;
1214  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1215  }
1216  return retVal;
1217 }
1218 
1228 void MmwDemo_waitSensorStopComplete(void)
1229 {
1230  UInt event;
1231  /* Pend on the START NOTIFY event */
1232  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify,
1233  Event_Id_NONE,
1234  MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT,
1235  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1236 
1237  /************************************************************************
1238  * STOP notification
1239  ************************************************************************/
1240  if(event & MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT)
1241  {
1242  /* do nothing */
1243  }
1244  else {
1245  /* we should block forever till we get the event. If the desired event
1246  didnt happen, then throw an assert */
1247  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1248  }
1249 }
1250 
1260 void MmwDemo_notifyBssSensorStop(void)
1261 {
1262  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT);
1263 }
1264 
1274 void MmwDemo_notifyDathPathStop(void)
1275 {
1276  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT);
1277 }
1278 
1290 int32_t MmwDemo_sensorMgmtInit (void)
1291 {
1292  Error_Block eb;
1293  Task_Params taskParams;
1294 
1295  /* Initialize the session management module: */
1296  memset ((void *)&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_SensorMgmtMCB));
1297 
1298  /* Setup the event handle used by the sensor management task: */
1299  Error_init(&eb);
1300  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle = Event_create(NULL, &eb);
1301  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle == NULL)
1302  {
1303  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1304  return -1;
1305  }
1306 
1307  Error_init(&eb);
1308  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify = Event_create(NULL, &eb);
1309  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify == NULL)
1310  {
1311  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1312  return -1;
1313  }
1314 
1315 
1316  /* Sensor is in INIT state */
1317  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_INIT;
1318 
1319  /* Sensor is not started */
1320  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = false;
1321 
1322  /* Launch the Session Management Task: */
1323  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
1324  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle = Task_create(MmwDemo_sensorMgmtTask, &taskParams, NULL);
1325  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle == NULL)
1326  {
1327  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1328  return -1;
1329  }
1330  return 0;
1331 }
1332 
1344 int32_t MmwDemo_sensorMgmtDeinit (void)
1345 {
1346  /* Delete the Task: */
1347  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle != NULL)
1348  {
1349  Task_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle);
1350  }
1351 
1352  /* Delete the Event: */
1353  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle != NULL)
1354  {
1355  Event_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle);
1356  }
1357 
1358  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify != NULL)
1359  {
1360  Event_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify);
1361  }
1362  return 0;
1363 }
